location: Tianmu East Road, Shilin District - near Tianmu Sports Park, close to international schools and Sanyu Elementary
notes: Large 4BR/2BA unit spanning floors 5-7 in a 7-story elevator building with newly renovated kitchen. Two balconies provide good natural light. Established low-density residential area with excellent access to international schools (5 min walk), parks, hospitals, and shopping. No pets allowed. Baby safety: multi-floor layout may involve internal stairs which could be a concern; balcony railing safety should be verified during viewing.
